QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, cast(replace(i.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, ec.provid, i.ins_type, i.insurance_date, i.insurance_time from {sc}.insurance i JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND i.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = i.encid order by cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
